oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Update to Statement from Highlander Executive Council
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Statement on Judge Chattin's ruling of February 16, that Highlander was guilty on all three charges and should be closed. It reassures friends that workshops will continue and outlines future workshops and programs for the coming year. It also asks for more donations to fund these programs as well as Highlander's appeal.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Judgments; Governmental investigations; Segregation; School integration; Education; Segregation in education; Segregation--Law and legislation; Private schools; American Civil Liberties Union; Vanderbilt University; University of the South; Fisk University; Scarritt College for Christian Workers; Race relations in school management; College integration; Tax exemption
